description: Hordes of crazed out-of control bunnies have invaded, enslaving Rayman and forcing him to participate in 'gladiator' style trials. Help Rayman win his freedom back by entertaining and outwitting these fury foes. Use the most hilarious fighting moves imaginable.

reviews.review_text: Finally! I was finally able to re-buy this Game. I used to play this Game back in my Childhood day by day. I never finished it though.... But! I can now. Bought it for 3 bucks only and it was totally worth it.   RECOMMENDED! BWAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH! <-- some will understand.
Old and classic never gets old to play games like this. I simply just love it.
It's really cute and a fun time-killer. Plus, it doesn't kill my laptop every time I try to power on the game, so this is a huge plus for me :)! I really am enjoying it :)!
This is the best game I've ever played IN MY ENTIRE LIFE.

I enjoy rayman series, but this game i don't enjoy. This game is a series of small 'mini games', which require serious key mashing at points. It did have some smile worthy points as i played, which was a nice aspect. May be enjoyable for a younger crowd though, who knows perhaps i'm too old for this type of game anymore.
